title: removing boarder
body: hey hello i was just wondering if riot could remove my boarder as i rather not have one i preferably rather it just plane

replies.body:
You can send in a support ticket and they are gonna ask you a couple of questions just to validate that the account you're using belongs to you.
So you basically send in a support ticket and they will give you these questions:

The original email address used to register the account:
List of locations that you have played on this account (City and Country):
Your current IP address(http://whatsmyip.net/)
First five champions ever purchased on this account:
First item ever purchased with RP (if applicable):
List of payment methods used to purchase RP:
Who made this account?
Any other people (including family members/friends) that have ever had access to the account:

and here is the support ticket link:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us
Just to reiterate, as this is important; *That information goes in the ticket*. Please do not post any of it on the boards.
